ebawin ada tharagaye di wadi pidanayak ellawanu aththe shri lanka kandayamataya.pasugiya tharaga 2hidima palamu inimedi shri lanka pile durwala pithiharambaaya pasubamata thiranathmaka sadhakayak wu bawin ada tharagayen ee adupaduwa magaharawa ganimin siya palamu inimata wishala lakunu pramanayak ras kara ganima shri lanka kandayame aramuna wi atha.kesewethath pithikaruwanta uchitha es. es. si. thanathiruwe test krikat ithihasaya hara awissimedi me dakwa wadi wasi aththe shri lankawata bawa peni yayi.mita pera es. es. si. pitiye test tharaga 34k pawathwa athi athara in tharaga 17kma jaya ganimata shri lankawa samathwi atha.

thawath pasekin gawa palanayada sanwardhana ilakka athara weyi.yuddhaya pawathi samaye mema pradeshayen janathawa iwathwi athi athara 2009n pasu kramanukulawa nawatha ema janathawa siya gam bim wetha pamini athara supurudu paridi gowithana katayuthu arambaa thibe.eheth sanwardhana salasum kriyathmaka kirima mulkaraganimin 2015 wasare sita wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwe mangapenwima yatathe nawatha padinchi wu janathawa athadanguwata ganna bawa pradeshawasin prakasha karayi.kese wethath me wana wita janathawa iwath karamin sitina athara mema thorathuru madhyayata warthawimada walakwimata deshapalana baladhikaraya katayuthu karana bawayi pradeshawasin chodana karanne.
